instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a sharp right towards Destination 1
instructions.es: Sigue cerrada a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gira cerrada a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.hu: Forduljon élesen jobbra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.ja: 右戻るに向かい、その後Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.my: ညာဘက် ထောင့်ချိုးဆီသို့Destination 1ကို ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.nl: Ga scherpe bocht naar rechts richting Destination 1
instructions.no: Ta en skarp høyre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Ostro w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Siga fechada à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Siga acentuadamente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zavijte ostro desno v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde keskin sağ yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь різко праворуч в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.yo: Ṣe a didasilẹ ọtun si ọna Destination 1
